main event: On August 13, 1961, a sighting of a circular UFO was reported in Kansas City, Kansas, observed via ground radar.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 6 to 8 miles away and traveling at a speed of 500-600 knots,The object was circular in shape and looked like a sled with running boards,Several objects were reported to be circling with rapid oscillation,Sightings lasted for 8 minutes before the object broke away at high speed,Classified as Unknown due to lack of categories to describe it.
sighted object: circular object resembling a sled with running boards
witness description: Both witnesses were senior college students at Drake University.
